amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the National Institute of Standards and Technology to consult with the National Security Agency or the CIA to alter cryptographic or computer standards, except to improve information security.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the National Institute of Standards and Technology to consult with the National Security Agency or the CIA to alter cryptographic or computer standards, except to improve information security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A074) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 43 (Roll no. 290).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A074) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 43 (Roll no. 290).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A074) offered by Mr. Massie.
